Manager

Class manageMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager.manageMember
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class manageMember
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manager Class for Members. Members are customers that holds a membership of the restaurant.
    Since:
    2021-11-11
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ju Khang, Zaki
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

               throws java.io.IOException

      • getMemberListIndexById

        public int getMemberListIndexById(long memberId)
        Function to retrieve the index of a desired member object given the memberId
        Parameters:
        memberId - attribute memberId, unique identifier of the member object
        Returns:
        integer index of the member object if found, else return -1

      • viewIndividualMember

        public void viewIndividualMember(long memberId)
        Display the information of an individual member given the memberId
        Parameters:
        memberId - attribute memberId, unique identifier of the member object

      • removeMember

        public void removeMember()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Remove a member from the memberList, they no longer holds a membership of the restaurant. Updates the member txt file after deletion.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateMember

        public void updateMember(long memberId)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the information of a member given the memberId. Able to choose which attributes out of all existing attributes of member to edit After editing any information, the saveMemberList() function will be triggered to save the memberList array into the txt file
        Parameters:
        memberId - attribute memberId
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
